casebody.data:
Sherri WILSON, Personal Representative of the Estate of Luella Ehrlinger, Deceased, Plaintiff-Appellant,
v.
Phillip A. DEAN, M.D. and Mid-Michigan Surgical Specialists, P.C., Defendants-Appellees,
and
Covenant Medical Center, Inc., d/b/a Covenant Healthcare, Defendant. SC: 157241
COA: 334243 Supreme Court of Michigan. July 27, 2018

Order

On order of the Court, the application for leave to appeal the January 9, 2018 judgment of the Court of Appeals is considered, and it is DENIED, because we are not persuaded that the questions presented should be reviewed by this Court.
